description:
In just 30 minutes you will not only know exactly what constitutes a killer resume but you will also know exactly how to go about creating one.

This course is ideal for anyone looking to rejuvenate or even create their resume in the first place. It is taught with visuals explaining what a resume is all about, how to structure and format it, what it should and should not include and how to identity a solid or poor resume.

Bonus material includes ensuring your supporting Cover Letter contains only relevant information as well as my personal top tips on how to land your dream job and how I did it in just 9 days!
title: Landing Your Dream Job - Effective Resume Writing
